title: Could someone please find out if Frank H. Bernhart is operating his remodel & custom homes business as a Sole Proprietor or as a Corporation...Frank H. Bernhart Custom Homes & Frank H. Bernhart Custom Homes, Inc. Which one would be the right entity to sue him for telling lies to his customers about his legal operating entity the last 5 years?
text:
I'm sorry, but we can't answer your question. You are asking for
legal advice which should come from a lawyer.
